message: Login API is blocked — still waiting for OAuth keys from the platform team
Can we get an update on dashboard progress? The steering committee meets on Friday
CI/CD pipeline is live — builds and deploys are automated. No manual steps needed anymore.
User profile page and dashboard UI both merged. Looks great in staging!
Payment integration is blocked by login API. Cannot proceed until PROJ-101 is done and merged.
Heads up: security audit is blocked — compliance team has not signed off yet. Flagging as risk for this sprint.
Really happy with the dashboard UI! The team has done excellent work. Are we still on track for March 1 go-live?
Mobile responsive layout is in progress but hitting some edge cases. May push to next sprint.
Still waiting for a response from platform team about OAuth config — 5 days and no reply. Escalation needed?
All hands meeting Monday 9am — sprint review and planning. Please update your ticket statuses before then.
